mapper.select: SELECT c.company_id, c.company_address, c.company_image, jp.job_post_no, jp.title, jp.job_history, jp.start_date, jp.end_date , c.company_name, GROUP_CONCAT(jps.skill_code) AS skill_codes FROM tbl_job_post jp JOIN tbl_company c ON jp.company_id = c.company_id JOIN tbl_job_post_skill jps ON jp.job_post_no = jps.job_post_no GROUP BY jp.job_post_no ORDER BY start_date DESC;
